name: Edit Perception
desc:
Target creature must succeed on an Intuition saving throw. On a failure, you briefly invade their mind and remove the existence of yourself or a creature you can see from their perception. The chosen creature cannot be detected with any of the target's senses.

If the chosen creature damages or interacts with the target, it can repeat the saving throw. On a success, the spell ends.
author: CrusaderDroid
